description: Modern book creation platform with full editing, print-ready PDF generation, and POD integration

phases.phase10_multi_tenant: Multi-tenant storefront architecture with branded subdomains
phases.phase11_product_modes: Product mode adapters (cover-only vs custom interior)
phases.phase12_photo_book_mvp: Photo Book Platform MVP: upload, auto-layout, PDF generation
phases.phase13_photo_book_enhanced: Photo Book Enhanced: AI features, collaboration, multi-provider
phases.phase14_photo_book_premium: Photo Book Premium: marketplace, white-label, bulk ordering
